documents.document: @XabiRabbit yea true, hope not!
@TomasORuanaidh heard it at the time, great stuff
@TomasORuanaidh Yep it needs to be made part of Irish culture
@ahboythekid yea bang on, Schmidt mentioned the lions too.
@XabiRabbit of course he wouldn't.
Asked Schmidt last week about option of sabbatical for Sexton if injuries continue (with rwc'19 in mind). Said just focusing on this season.
All change in 24 hours. Watch Simon Easterby on the injury blows to Ireland and no Ian Madigan on The 5.30.
Peter O'Mahony ruled out of Scotland game
Johnny Sexton ruled out of this weekend's game
Warren Gatland at Ireland training this morning
Johnny Sexton "is on track to train tomorrow". Rob Kearney said Paddy Jackson has "been running the plays" all last week.
Greatest of all time but also most Gracious of all time #federer
@KieranFinn13 truly epic
This is something else #nadalvsfederer
@BernardOToole @ImGerTreacy Hope he wasn't cracking onto you Ger!
@PadraigMcKeon what photo?
@fahy_caroline definitely not Caroline! Fun times alright!
@MarkDow97133063 no idea to be honest
@DavidMatthews2 absolutely, this should have happened decades ago
@SteedFiona @IrishRugby oh dear, at least when there were loads of people there for athletics events there was some body heat at least!
@AilisMc ha yea. It was a place where running was the only way to actually keep warm. Good times!
New indoor track. Fond memories of competing in indoor track in Nenagh but used to be colder inside than outside https://t.co/58fPJdmUvt
@RuthGorman_UTV @RealCFrampton Have a great week Ruth ðŸ¥Š

Joe Schmidt & Eddie Jones on The 5.30 this evening.

This is excruciatingly close for Connacht and making history #TOUvCON
@DiarmuidOHallor @Independent_ie thank you
Well said, O'Gara. Look forward to the day when* he returns to coach Munster someday. *yes, when
Clear the decks for the first weekend in April. Over to Connacht to make it three provinces in last 8.
Great work rate, solid defensively and under high ball, Conway looks like Joe Schmidt's kind of winger. Should be named in Ireland 6N squad
@Mallorie_Ronan thanks

Wrote about Peter O'Mahony and how he shouldered Munster through transition and tragedy https://t.co/fshbzei4hx
My dad texted me this pic from the black valley today.. kerry, in the winter https://t.co/06yi7C8D8I
@leecaluan Who's complaining? It's a fact. Murray himself said today he has to learn to deal with it. No moaning.
@niamhieobrien not sure if sport is on 3player. Try record or tv3+1!
Also spoke to Murray about being targeted. More on The 5.30.
Rassie Erasmus says munster would never jeopardise the welfare of a player re Conor Murray incident. More on The 5.30.
Conor Murray said he "didn't lose consciousness" in Glasgow. Said he came through all tests & doesn't think munster will have case to answer
Keith Earls rated "50-50" for Munster's game v Racing. O'Mahony, O'Donnell & Zebo all trained today.
Caught up with Joe Sheridan to talk about his new goalkeeper role with Meath. On The 5.30. https://t.co/NNuAYXHtpt
Missed those edge-of-seat end-games from Munster. Get a home quarter and anything can happen...
Conway has been superb
What's sharper than a knife-edge? #GLAvMUN
@johnfitzp1967 will be biggest test of season so far
@Cumoski Point proved again
@tmoroney4697 now you're talking!
@johnfitzp1967 Draw not made yet
Go on 2017, give us a Leinster v Munster European semi-final. It's been too long.
Fantasy rugby from Leinster tonight
New players Crosbie, Farrell & McCabe among those training with Connacht today https://t.co/sXXz2YYAXZ
Crosbie is Cup-tied so can't play in champions cup games. Connacht say Craig Ronaldson could be fit for this weekend
Good news re Ultan Dillane - he doesn't require surgery on ankle. Expected back in 3-4 weeks
Connacht confirm that outhalf Steve Crosbie & centre Tom Farrell have joined province for rest of season. Prop Peter McCabe joins on loan
@SeneNaoupu Thank you for your time!
Loved this celebration from the Munster captain. https://t.co/VdbAoSx6QR

Johnny Sexton back for Leinster - he will captain the team v Zebre tomorrow
Mick O'Connell takes no shit. Brilliant

Munster prepare for the trip back to Paris this weekend https://t.co/8lVMA5phSl
Darren Sweetnam sidelined for six weeks. No definitive news on Tommy O'Donnell injury.
Jaco Taute's loan deal until end of season confirmed by Munster
@spinxy82 so the public should rule? Of course not. Disciplinary panels need to make players more accountable for their acts on the pitch
What an incredibly solid & conscientious head coach Rassie Erasmus is. Has guided Munster through the toughest months imaginable.
